title: Textile, "Double 'S'", 1956
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
inscribed: Double 'S' Amanda Hand Print (printed in selvedge)
description: Geometric design with black lines and green rectangles and squares. Heavy black lines create a linear design suggestive of a Greek key motif. In the background are green-shaded rectangles and squares surrounded by hatch marks that suggest shading. Printed from blocks cut by the designer.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Double 'S'", 1956.
1956. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Helen A. Haselton. 1956-87-2.
